lifeItem1.message:
(A book. "Orpheus and Eurydice."
It feels warm, alive. Your heart seems lighter.
The pull lessens.)

lifeItem2.message:
(A game controller...
Did you play games? What did you play?
It feels snug in your hands.
The pull lessens.)

lifeItem3.message:
(A thermos...
It belonged to... your father.
He drank Earl Grey every morning.
So did you. The pull lessens.)
